column1: Little Goat Diner////You can also say I feel love at this Diner because of my boyfriend
column2: he introduced me. About a year ago me and my boyfriend were out
column3: it was late and we were starving. My sweetheart said "I know
column4: let's check out Little Goat" and since then
column5: We were both fans. Jason loves the Tuna melt
column6: it's apparently the best tuna melt he's ever had. For me? Hand's down... The Chickpea Salad
column7: the reason I eat and love kale. I mean it
column8: When I think of what I want for dinner
column9: it's this salad. I ask for it to be customized to my taste
column10: respectfully and professionally they always help me out.
